name: Bloody Blobs (albertmancias)
description:
You awaken in a room with a Baby Yoda (I know that's not the actual name).

You discover the place is being taken over by mysterious red blobs.

You must protect the Baby Yoda with the guns, health, and turrets provided.

Instructions

Just survive as long as you can while protecting the Baby Yoda. You have a pistol at your disposal but better weapons are found around the map. Rack up enough kills and you unlock an automatic turret. Energy drinks revive your health.

Controls

Movement - Arrow Keys

Shooting - Space Bar

Placing Turrets - E

Notes

  • I was dumb and did not put a pause menu so pressing escape will close the window.
  • Also, the turrets get kind of wonky after the first two and start shooting in random directions influence from the previous turrets.

Thank you for checking this project out! I made this in a week to get more accustomed to GameMaker Studio 2.
